mapper.select: select row_number() OVER (order by d_berita_berlaku desc, i_nourut asc) as idBerita, d_berita_berlaku as tglBerlaku, to_char(d_berita_berakhir, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as tglAkhir, d_berita_berakhir as tglBerakhir, nvl(n_pdf_file,'-') as namaPdf, nvl(n_pdf_judul,'-') as judulPdf, i_nourut as noUrut, e_berita as uraian, e_berita_tujuan as tujuanBerita, e_berita_dari as pengirimBerita from tmberita where C_BERITA_GROUP in ('SPM','ALL') and c_aktif = 1 and c_popup = 0 and TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'DD/MM/YY') between D_BERITA_BERLAKU and D_BERITA_BERAKHIR order by d_berita_berlaku desc, i_nourut asc

select count(*) as banyak from ( select d_berita_berlaku as tglBerlaku, d_berita_berakhir as tglBerakhir, i_nourut as noUrut, e_berita as uraian, e_berita_tujuan as tujuanBerita, e_berita_dari as pengirimBerita from tmberita where C_BERITA_GROUP in ('SPM','ALL') and c_aktif = 1 and c_popup = 0 and TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'DD/MM/YY') between D_BERITA_BERLAKU and D_BERITA_BERAKHIR )

SELECT n_pdf_file FROM tmberita where C_BERITA_GROUP in ('SPM','ALL') and c_popup = 1 and c_aktif = 1 and TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'DD/MM/YY') between D_BERITA_BERLAKU and D_BERITA_BERAKHIR and rownum = 1 order by i_id desc

select count(*) as banyak from ( SELECT n_pdf_file as namaPdf FROM tmberita where C_BERITA_GROUP in ('SPM','ALL') and c_popup = 1 and c_aktif = 1 and TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'DD/MM/YY') between D_BERITA_BERLAKU and D_BERITA_BERAKHIR and rownum = 1 order by i_id desc )
